details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Merciless Hunt
  • Surging Adrenaline
  • Beyond-er Blade, Beyond Blade Barrage and Piercing Beyond Blade

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

extraContent.title: Combo System
extraContent.content:
Aran has a special Combo mechanic where each hit that Aran lands, increases your Combo count. As your Combo count increases, you gain bonus stats like Attack, DEF, and %Crit Rate

Additionally in 3rd Job, every time you hit 1000 Combo, you gain access to Adrenaline Mode by using Adrenaline Rush Activate to temporarily enter a berserk state where your attacks gain special abilities

Several of Aran's skills can be activated by pressing buttons in combination to activate them. Alternatively, Aran's skills can also be assigned a Key Slots to manually activate them. The following skills can be activated in such ways:

  • Combat Step (Beginner) → + → / Jump + Jump
  • Smash Wave (1st Job) ↓ + → + Attack
  • Final Charge (2nd Job) ← + ↓ + → + Attack
  • Final Toss (2nd Job) ↑ + Attack
  • Rolling Spin (2nd Job) ↓ + ↑ + Attack
  • Final Blow (3rd Job) ↓ + Attack
  • Judgment Draw (3rd Job) ↓ + ↑ + Attack / ↑ + → + Attack
  • Gathering Hook (3rd Job) ↑ + ↑ + Attack
  • Maha's Carnage (5th Job) ↓ + ↓ + Attack

The following skills can only be activated during Adrenaline Rush (once per activation) and can only be triggered by Key Inputs

  • Finisher - Storm of Fear (4th Job) ↓ + ← + → + Attack (Hold)
  • Finisher - Hunter's Prey (4th Job) ↓ + → + ↓ + Attack (Hold)

Command skills listed above can be locked to prevent accidentally activating them with Key Inputs by right-clicking the skill

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Regained Memory
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase Attack Power: +5%, DEF: +300, Speed: +10
details: Gained from completing Arkarium storyline/pre-quests

primary.name: Combat Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, travel a short distance\nMovement Speed +15, Max Movement Speed +20
primary.desc: Double jump and dash skill
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed and Max Movement Speed
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice or pressing the Forward Arrow Key twice
If used on the ground, you will dash forward
If used in the air, you will perform a double jump
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from cancelling with the Arrow Keys

primary.name: Return to Rien
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100.\nCooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: Teleports to Rien, Aran's hometown

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'Weapon Acknowledges Its Owner'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Combo Ability
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance +50%, For every 50 Combo Counts, ATT: +2, DEF: +20, Speed: +3, Max Stacks: 10

primary.name: Smash Swing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Damage: 150%, Attacks Per Swing: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Swings your polearm up to three times consecutively

primary.name: Smash Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Damage: 500%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 1\nCooldown: 3 sec
primary.desc: Fires a burst of energy forward that pierces through enemies
details:
[Command]: ↓ + → + Attack
  • [Note]: Combo Attacks can be locked (right-clicking a skill) to prevent the Skill from activating with Key Inputs

primary.name: Agile Polearms
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Body Pressure
primary.shortDesc: Damage Reflected: 500%
primary.desc: While active, reflect back damage taken

primary.name: Final Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Damage: 300%, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Use command to stun enemies for 10 sec
primary.desc: Dashes forward while also pushing back enemies
details:
[Command]: ← + ↓ + → + Attack
  • Command version will stun enemies

primary.name: Final Toss
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 550%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage to Airborne Enemies: +100% points
primary.desc: Lifts multiple enemies in front of you into the air
details:
[Command]: ↑ + Attack
  • Command version increases jump height
Can be used twice
Deals additional %p Damage to airborne enemies

primary.name: Rolling Spin
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 37, Damage: 555%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Use command to stun enemies for 5 sec
primary.desc: Spin your polearm while standing in place
details:
[Command]: ↓ + ↑ + Attack
  • Command version stuns enemies hit
Lifts enemies up into the air

primary.name: Drain
primary.shortDesc: Recovers 1% of your Max HP when attacking enemies. Permanently increases Max HP by 10%.

primary.name: Snow Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 33, Enemy Speed: -40 for 20 sec, Damage: +10% when attacking enemies that have had their speed reduced. When used against bosses, the Speed reduction's duration is cut in half.\n[Passive Effects - Damage: +10%]
primary.desc: Attacks slow enemy movement speed
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage

Attacking enemies with slowed movement will deal increased %Damage
  • Can be used on bosses but slow duration is reduced

primary.name: Polearm Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Polearm Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed +1, Final Damage: +8%

primary.name: Command Mastery I
primary.shortDesc: Skill damage increases by 5% points when the skill is triggered with a command.

primary.name: Swing Studies I
primary.shortDesc: Smash Swing Damage: +200% points\n[Final Attack Skills] Creates an afterimage that attacks up to 4 enemies with 100% damage 2 times when you use other direct attack skills after Smash Swing. Increases Speed during swings.
primary.desc: Increases %p Damage of and increases Movement Speed during swings
details: [Final Attack]: Creates an additional attack whenever you use other skills after

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal Final Attack damage of 150%.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Advanced Combo Ability
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +50%, Attack Power: +10, Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +10%, Critical Rate (per 50 combos): +3%, Attack Power (per 10 combos): +2, Max Stacks: 10
details: Increases %Knockback Resistance provided
Now increases %Crit Rate for every 50 combo and grants flat Attack for every 10 combo (up to 10 stacks)
Now grants flat Attack and increases Abnormal Status Resistance, %Elemental Resistance, %Crit Rate, and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Aero Swing
primary.shortDesc: Can use Smash Swing while airborne, damage increases by 100% points

primary.name: Adrenaline Rush Active
primary.shortDesc: Usable for 300 seconds after reaching 1,000 combos. If Adrenaline Rush is not activated during that time, your Adrenaline will begin to diminish, and your combo count will be reduced to 800.
primary.desc: At 1000 Combos, using this skill will activate Adrenaline state
details: If Adrenaline state is not activated within the timeframe, your combo count will be reduced to 800

primary.name: Adrenaline Rush
primary.shortDesc: After reaching 1,000 Combos, enter by using Adrenaline Rush Activate within a certain period of time: For 15 sec, Aran's skill damage increases by 150% points, excluding Finisher/summoning/additional attack skills. Further, Aran's attack count will increase by 2, and the maximum monsters hit will increase by 5.\nSkill damage permanently increases by 100% points
primary.desc: At 1000 Combos, you may enter an Adrenaline state where your skills are enhanced and gain increased %p Damage
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases your %p Damage of skills
Additionally attacks have increased hits per attack and maximum number of enemies hit
will shoot out three projectiles
will leave an ice trail that freezes enemies
will shoot out a shockwave in front of you

primary.name: Final Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 285%, Number of Attacks: 5, Ignored Monster DEF: 15%\nShoots 1 shockwaves that attack up to 6 enemies with 350% damage 4 times during Adrenaline Rush.
primary.desc: Swings your polearm to create a swiping attack
details:
[Command]: ↓ + Attack
  • Command version prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
The third swing from will automatically be a Final Blow
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Judgment Draw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 380%, Attack Count: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Freeze Duration: 10 sec, Damage Over Time: 200% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec.
primary.desc: Slams your polearm into the ground damaging nearby enemies
details:
[Command]: ↓ + ↑ + Attack / ↑ + → + Attack
  • Command version will freeze enemies
  • Using the ↑ + → + Attack version will instead attack diagonally
    • Allows you to snap onto ledges and acts as a short-ranged teleport

primary.name: Gathering Hook
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 2\nCooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Gathers nearby enemies to in front of you
details:
[Command]: ↑ + ↑ + Attack
  • Command version can be used to animation cancel

primary.name: Maha Blessing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Attack Power: +30, Magic ATT: +30, Duration: 200 sec

primary.name: Might
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +40, DEF: +215, Damage required to knock back a monster decreased to 10%.

primary.name: Cleaving Blows
primary.shortDesc: Monster DEF Ignored: 40%, Damage: +30%

primary.name: Beyond Blade
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 295%, Number of Attacks: 5. Deals up to 3 additional hits with consecutive key presses.
2 Hits: Attack 5 times for 311% damage
3 Hits: Attack 5 times for 326% damage.
Bonus Critical Rate: 100%, Ignore Monster DEF: 30%, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +8%
Damage: +20%p when used by linking with Final Blow.
Fires a shockwave that hits up to 6 enemies for 400% damage 5 times if in Adrenaline Rush state.
primary.desc: Performs 3 separate attacks consecutively, dealing increased %Damage the fewer enemies hit
details: Deals increased %p Damage if is used first and linked together
Attack has additional %Ignore DEF, is a guaranteed Critical Hit, and deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
While casting, prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
During , shockwaves will be shot both in front and behind you

primary.name: Finisher - Storm of Fear
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Duration: 10 sec\nOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.
primary.desc: Creates a whirlwind around you that pulls in nearby enemies
details: Can only be used in and only one finisher can be used per rush
[Command]: ↓ + ← + → + Attack (Hold)

primary.name: Finisher - Hunter's Prey
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Hold key down to charge and use arrow keys to change direction once activated. A Chase Cut that strikes 15 times, dealing 1070% to 1 monsters, is activated 7 time(s). Invincible while charging. Damage increases by 100% for every 1 sec spent charging, up to 500%. Can charge for up to 5 sec.\nOnly one finisher can be triggered per Adrenaline Rush.
primary.desc: Charges forward to strike a powerful blow that targets the enemy or boss with the highest Max HP in the direction you are facing
details:
The longer you charge, the more damage dealt
  • You are invincible while charging

While charging, you may change directions
  • If there are no enemies in the direction you are facing, attack will target the nearest enemy
  • If no enemies within range, you will dash towards the direction you are facing
Can only be used in and only one finisher can be used per rush
[Command]: ↓ + → + ↓ + Attack (Hold)

primary.name: High Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Polearm Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +8%, Final Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage and %Final Damage

primary.name: High Defense
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -40%, HP: +20%, DEF: +300

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Sudden Strike
primary.shortDesc: Damage dealt by Smash Wave, Final Charge, Final Toss, Rolling Spin, Judgment Draw, and Final Blow: +60% points
primary.desc: Increases %p Damage of , , , , , and

primary.name: Command Mastery II
primary.shortDesc: Skill damage increases by 20% points when the skill is triggered with a command.
details: Increases %p Damage bonus provided for command triggered skills

primary.name: Swing Studies II
primary.shortDesc: Smash Swing Damage: +250% points\n[Final Attack Skills] Creates an afterimage that attacks up to 6 enemies with 280% damage 5 times when you use other direct attack skills after Smash Swing. Increases Speed during swings.
details: Increases %p Damage for
Increases %Damage and number of hits of afterimage Final Attack

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 60%, Damage: 85%, Times Activated: 3.
details: Increases activation chance, %Damage, and number of hits
Now additionally grants flat Attack

hyperPassive.name: Rebounding Swing
details: Increases the %Damage of the additional attacks from

hyperActive.name: Adrenaline Burst
hyperActive.desc: Instantly activates
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets

hyperActive.name: Maha's Domain
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec., Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 5. Deals 3 attacks of 500% damage each to enemies in range for 8 sec. Removes some Abnormal Statuses from party members and restores HP/MP by 20% every second\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Summons a giant polearm create a zone which restores %Max HP/MP and remove debuffs of party members every second
details: Enemies within the zone are also periodically damaged
Upon use, you are briefly invincible

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Maha's Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, instantly increases combo to 160, Maha empowers you for 37 sec, Attack Power: +30%\nBlizzard Damage: 900% every 3 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Equips Maha which will instantly increase combo to 160 and grants %Attack Power
details: While active, periocially, a blizzard appears around you damaging nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Maha's Carnage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 15, Chase Cut Activation Count: 2, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 20 sec, reduced by 50% when Maha's Fury is activated.
fifthMain.desc: Swing Maha and slam it into the ground leaving a trail of destruction
details:
[Command]: Down, Down + Attack Key
  • Command version prevents knockback
Has increased %Boss Damage
Cooldown is reduced by half if is active
Unaffected by Damage Reduction and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Fenrir Crash
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Damage: 710%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 10
Bonus Critical Rate: 100%, Additional Ignore Defense: 50%
While Adrenaline Rush is active, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 6, Iceberg Damage: 625%
Can be used after Beyond Blade 3rd Hit.
fifthMain.desc: After the 3rd attack of , Fenrir crashes down on the ground, damaging nearby enemies
details: Used automatically after 3rd hit
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
While casting, prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
During , an iceberg will appear dealing damage to nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Blizzard Tempest
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 8, Stun Duration: 10. 
Stun Duration can increase up to 100% depending on the damage dealt with this attack. For 20 sec afterwards, activates an aura that periodically casts the Dire Wolf's curse on up to 10 enemies. Using the skill again, while its effect is active, will cancel that effect.
Dire Wolf's Curse: Duration: 10 sec, Upon a successful hit, attacks up to 15 enemies under the curse with ice chunks, dealing 950% damage 4 time(s). The curse can stack up to 6 time(s), and the ice chunks increase by 1 in proportion to the accumulated curse.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a blizzard that binds nearby enemies and debuffs them
details:
After casting, you gain an aura that inflicts the same debuff
  • Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the aura

When hit by any attack except , an icicle strikes down on that enemy and damages nearby enemy
  • For each attack, the debuff stacks (up to 6 times) which will increase the number of icicles created
  • Icicles ignore by Damage Reflect
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the ice chunk effect
Pressing the Attack Key and right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the bind effect

masteryCore.name: HEXA Beyond Blade
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 52, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 525%, Number of Attacks: 5
Deals up to 3 additional hits with consecutive key presses.
2 Hits: Attack 5 times for 540% damage
3 Hits: Attack 5 times for 555% damage.
Bonus Critical Rate: 100%, Ignore Monster DEF: 30%, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +8%
Damage: +35%p when used by linking with Final Blow.
Maha appears every 4 sec to deal 600% damage up to 3 enemies 6 times
Maha's attack cooldown decreases to 2 sec while Adrenaline Rush is active.

originSkill.name: Adrenaline Surge
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, Awakened Adrenaline State Duration: 20 sec, Cooldown: 360 sec
Howling Swing
1st hit - MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 10
2nd hit - MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 10
3rd hit - MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1440%, Number of Attacks: 12
4th hit - MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1680%, Number of Attacks: 14
When in Adrenaline Surge, activate a shockwave that deals 600% damage up to 8 enemies 10 times, shockwave activates Swing Studies afterimage.
Using the skill again ends awakened Adrenaline and activates 29 final blows that deal 2057% damage to up to 15 enemies 14 times. During Adrenaline Surge, Number of Final Blows: +1 per 50 accumulated combos. Invincible during casting of final blow.

meta: Aran is a STR warrior class part of the Heroes class group. Aran is a swift heavy attacker that utilizes a special Combo mechanic. Upon reaching max combo, Aran will go into an Adrenaline Rush where you gain incredible powers. The class naturally deals heavy damage and is suitable for beginners
